name: Dawn of the Eighth Night
description:
A short 15k word adventure, meant as an introduction to a concept I'll be working with more in the future.

Explore a world beyond the veil of dreams: The secret Eighth Night of the week rears its head, and with it come the questions of its origins...and the unknowable creatures which inhabit it. The world mirrors our own, but is it a mirror or an aspect of ourselves we've long since forgotten? Those answers lie hidden in the moonlight.

Get to know a few of the characters who'll become a staple within the concept, and experience 5 main paths with a total of 15 endings. If you're picky about those endings being different, there's still at least ten.

The base concept for the Eighth Night was also co-made with a friend who wishes to go unnamed, and uncredited aside from this sentence.
